name: Cat-O-Pult
description:
My Ludum Dare 36 entry.

In this game you use cats as your weapon of choice. You need to conquer dwarven fortifications with the power of cat love!

Game made with Godot Engine 2.1

Graphics produced with Krita 3.0

Another 2 weeks after LD, and the game is finished! 32 glorious levels! 1 Silly soundtrack! And a lot of cats to launch!
